definition: describing nudity or sexual activity in graphic detail, an image that is generated by a computer
details:
adjective
- describing nudity or sexual activity in graphic detail
= example: describing nudity or sexual activity in graphic detail
- evoking lifelike images within the mind
= synonyms: lifelike
- written or drawn or engraved
= example: written or drawn or engraved
= synonyms: graphical, in writing
- relating to or presented by a graph
= example: relating to or presented by a graph
= synonyms: graphical
- of or relating to the graphic arts
= example: of or relating to the graphic arts
noun
- an image that is generated by a computer
= synonyms: computer graphic
